name: Birdsong
description:
This is one-of-a-kind single-ply merino wool handspun yarn. I handdyed the wool top with lightfast, washfast permanent dye, put the wool through the carder and spun it on Majacraft Rose spinning wheel. Birdsong is perfect for knitting hat, cowl or neckwarmer.

Colors are mostly blue with some turquoise, pale orange, brown 
Smooth soft balance yarn. Perfect for next to skin project

Content: 100% Merino Wool 
Length: Single ply. Approximately 158-177 yards (select options below)
Weight: Worsted weight 
WPI: 9-10 (wraps per inch) 
Care: Handwash, lay flat to dry

All my wool and yarns come from non-smoking, pet-friendly home. I have one dog and one cat. However, they are not allowed in my studio. If you have any questions, please contact me before purchase. Thanks for looking!!!

name: Green - Merino Wool Top
description:
This is solid-colored, beautiful and soft commercially prepared and dyed combed top from Ashland Bay. High quality, bright and vibrant solid color.

100% merino wool 64's combed top. 21.5 microns with staple length of 70 mm or 2.75 inches. Suitable for spinning next-to-skin projects and great fun for felting too.

All my wool and yarns come from non-smoking, pet-friendly home. I have one dog and one cat. However, they are not allowed in my studio.

I will ship after the payment is cleared. If you have any questions, please contact me before purchase. Thanks for looking!!!

name: Green Apple
description:
This is one-of-a-kind single-ply corriedale wool handspun yarn. I handdyed the wool top with lightfast, washfast permanent dye and spun it on Majacraft Rose spinning wheel.  Green Apple is perfect for knitting outerwear garment such as glove, mittens, hat or socks.

Color is semi-solid delicious green.

Content: 100% corriedale wool 
Weight: Medium worsted weight, slightly thick and thin
WPI: 9-10 (wraps per inch) 
Care: Handwash, lay flat to dry

All my yarn and fiber come from non-smoking, pet-friendly home. I have one dog and one cat. However, they are not allowed in my studio. If you have any questions, please contact me before purchase. Thanks for looking!!!

name: Peach Parfait
description:
This is one-of-a-kind two-ply merino wool handspun yarn. I handdyed the wool top with lightfast, washfast permanent dye, carded them into batts and spun them on Majacraft Rose spinning wheel.  Peach Parfait is perfect for knitting hat, neckwarmer or any neck-to-skin project.  Please make sure you purchase enough yardage for your project.

Happy colors: Peach, orange, gold, yellow.

Content: 100% Merino Wool  
Weight: Bulky/Chunky weight 
WPI: 6-7 (wraps per inch) 
Care: Handwash, lay flat to dry

All my yarn and fiber come from non-smoking, pet-friendly home. I have one dog and one cat. However, they are not allowed in my studio. If you have any questions, please contact me before purchase. Thanks for looking!!!
